created_by: Florian Roth (rule), Daniel Bohannon (idea), Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)
name: Suspicious PowerShell Parameter Substring
description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Yy][Ll][Ee]\ [Hh]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Yy][Ll]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Yy]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr][Oo][Ff]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr][Oo][Ff][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr][Oo][Ff][Ii][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Vv]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Xx]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \-[Ee][Pp]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Yy][Ll][Ee]\ [Hh]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Yy][Ll]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Yy]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii]\ [Hh].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn]\ [Hh][Ii][Dd][Dd][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr][Oo][Ff]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr][Oo][Ff][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Pp][Rr][Oo][Ff][Ii][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Nn][Oo][Nn][Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Aa][Cc][Tt][Ii][Vv]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Nn]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii][Cc]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll][Ii]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii][Oo]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ii]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Xx]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ee][Pp]\ [Bb][Yy][Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:(*\ \-windowstyle\ h\ * OR *\ \-windowstyl\ h* OR *\ \-windowsty\ h* OR *\ \-windowst\ h* OR *\ \-windows\ h* OR *\ \-windo\ h* OR *\ \-wind\ h* OR *\ \-win\ h* OR *\ \-wi\ h* OR *\ \-win\ h\ * OR *\ \-win\ hi\ * OR *\ \-win\ hid\ * OR *\ \-win\ hidd\ * OR *\ \-win\ hidde\ * OR *\ \-NoPr\ * OR *\ \-NoPro\ * OR *\ \-NoProf\ * OR *\ \-NoProfi\ * OR *\ \-NoProfil\ * OR *\ \-nonin\ * OR *\ \-nonint\ * OR *\ \-noninte\ * OR *\ \-noninter\ * OR *\ \-nonintera\ * OR *\ \-noninterac\ * OR *\ \-noninteract\ * OR *\ \-noninteracti\ * OR *\ \-noninteractiv\ * OR *\ \-ec\ * OR *\ \-encodedComman\ * OR *\ \-encodedComma\ * OR *\ \-encodedComm\ * OR *\ \-encodedCom\ * OR *\ \-encodedCo\ * OR *\ \-encodedC\ * OR *\ \-encoded\ * OR *\ \-encode\ * OR *\ \-encod\ * OR *\ \-enco\ * OR *\ \-en\ * OR *\ \-executionpolic\ * OR *\ \-executionpoli\ * OR *\ \-executionpol\ * OR *\ \-executionpo\ * OR *\ \-executionp\ * OR *\ \-execution\ bypass* OR *\ \-executio\ bypass* OR *\ \-executi\ bypass* OR *\ \-execut\ bypass* OR *\ \-execu\ bypass* OR *\ \-exec\ bypass* OR *\ \-exe\ bypass* OR *\ \-ex\ bypass* OR *\ \-ep\ bypass* OR *\ \/windowstyle\ h\ * OR *\ \/windowstyl\ h* OR *\ \/windowsty\ h* OR *\ \/windowst\ h* OR *\ \/windows\ h* OR *\ \/windo\ h* OR *\ \/wind\ h* OR *\ \/win\ h* OR *\ \/wi\ h* OR *\ \/win\ h\ * OR *\ \/win\ hi\ * OR *\ \/win\ hid\ * OR *\ \/win\ hidd\ * OR *\ \/win\ hidde\ * OR *\ \/NoPr\ * OR *\ \/NoPro\ * OR *\ \/NoProf\ * OR *\ \/NoProfi\ * OR *\ \/NoProfil\ * OR *\ \/nonin\ * OR *\ \/nonint\ * OR *\ \/noninte\ * OR *\ \/noninter\ * OR *\ \/nonintera\ * OR *\ \/noninterac\ * OR *\ \/noninteract\ * OR *\ \/noninteracti\ * OR *\ \/noninteractiv\ * OR *\ \/ec\ * OR *\ \/encodedComman\ * OR *\ \/encodedComma\ * OR *\ \/encodedComm\ * OR *\ \/encodedCom\ * OR *\ \/encodedCo\ * OR *\ \/encodedC\ * OR *\ \/encoded\ * OR *\ \/encode\ * OR *\ \/encod\ * OR *\ \/enco\ * OR *\ \/en\ * OR *\ \/executionpolic\ * OR *\ \/executionpoli\ * OR *\ \/executionpol\ * OR *\ \/executionpo\ * OR *\ \/executionp\ * OR *\ \/execution\ bypass* OR *\ \/executio\ bypass* OR *\ \/executi\ bypass* OR *\ \/execut\ bypass* OR *\ \/execu\ bypass* OR *\ \/exec\ bypass* OR *\ \/exe\ bypass* OR *\ \/ex\ bypass* OR *\ \/ep\ bypass*))`
